context.rdfs:comment: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc.
context.rdfs:label: Organization

properties.rdfs:comment: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.
properties.rdfs:label: subOrganization

properties.rdfs:comment: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.
properties.rdfs:label: leiCode

properties.rdfs:comment: A person who founded this organization.
properties.rdfs:label: founders

properties.rdfs:comment: The date that this organization was dissolved.
properties.rdfs:label: dissolutionDate

properties.rdfs:comment: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.
properties.rdfs:label: department

properties.rdfs:comment: The larger organization that this organization is a subOrganization of, if any.
properties.rdfs:label: parentOrganization

properties.rdfs:comment: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.
properties.rdfs:label: legalName

properties.rdfs:comment: The date that this organization was founded.
properties.rdfs:label: foundingDate

properties.rdfs:comment: The place where the Organization was founded.
properties.rdfs:label: foundingLocation

properties.rdfs:comment: A person who founded this organization.
properties.rdfs:label: founder
